# Request for Proposals - Creative and Digital Agency Services

## Title and Reference
Title: Creative & Digital Agency Services
Reference Number: cb-345-60024472

## Solicitation Details
* Solicitation Number: 24-092-RFP
* Publication Date: 2024-11-15
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-12-06 16:00:00 (ET)

## Procurement Information
* Procurement Category: SER
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive Bid
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

## Background
The Canadian Museum of Nature (CMN) invites experienced, full-service agencies specializing in digital marketing strategy and creative, with all services provided in-house, to submit a proposal for the provision of creative and digital agency services. The proposal should outline how the agency will design and execute marketing plans for the CMN, starting January 1, 2025, for a period of three years.

## Bid Submission Details
* Electronic bids are mandatory and must be submitted via https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca by the due date and time.
* Bidders must register on the https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca website and create an online profile before submitting a bid.
* Bid submissions and registration are free of charge.
* Technical support is available by calling 1-800-354-8010 ext. 2 or submitting a request at https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca/portal/support

## Important Notes
* The documents on https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca are the official source of information on all bids for the Canadian Museum of Nature.
* Documents obtained from other sources will not be recognized during the bid and award process.
* Bidders should not rely on documents obtained from sources other than https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca, as this may result in the rejection of their bid.

## Attachment and Tender Documents
No attachments are provided with this notice. The full tender documents, including instructions, terms and conditions, and Scope of Work (SOW), are available on the website https://cmn-mcn.bonfirehub.ca.

## Evaluation and Selection
The evaluation process will be based on the selection criteria outlined above. The highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be used to select the successful bidder.

For more information, please contact Michelle Garber at approvisionnement-procurement
